name: Dr Grin's PlayRoom
description:
A horror game made for the Horror Humor Jam [8 Bits to Infinity]. You plas as Dr.Grin, a man who likes to extract weird things out of people to put them on weird positions.

Artists: Andrew Cabeza, Jorge Junco.

Programer: Martín Prieto

Designer: Alejandro Fernández.

Music:  Royalty-Free Music page of Joshua MCLean http://mrjoshuamclean.com/
